name: is-callable
description: Is this JS value callable? Works with Functions and GeneratorFunctions, despite ES6 @@toStringTag.

scripts.tests-only: npm run --silent test:stock && npm run --silent test:staging
scripts.istanbul: npm run --silent istanbul:clean && npm run --silent istanbul:std && npm run --silent istanbul:harmony && npm run --silent istanbul:merge && istanbul check
scripts.istanbul:merge: istanbul-merge --out coverage/coverage.raw.json coverage-harmony/coverage.raw.json coverage-std/coverage.raw.json && istanbul report html
